definitions.title: vb. shear, clip
definitions.body: (As. kasâmu, cut in pieces, acc. to Dl:HWB 344);—only

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. and Inf. abs. [[כָּסוֹם יִכְסְמוּ אֶת־רָאשֵׁיהֶם]] Ez Eze 44:20 they shall by all means clip their heads (opp. [[יְגַêֵלּחוּ]] shave and [[יְשַׁלֵָּחוּ]], i.e. let grow freely).
